thread.section_title: Ship Smart Inc. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ship Smart Inc. | shipsmart.com
thread.title: Charlotte
thread.title_full: Ship Smart Inc. reviewed by Charlotte

author: Charlotte
title: Charlotte
text: Ship Smart is the greatest service around. My shipment was in Georgia and I needed it moved to Texas but did not want to drive from Ga to Tx with it. Priced several options and Ship Smart was not only better in price, it was pain free and everything arrived intact without a scratch. The packing was unbelievable. Communication was the key and everyone was knowledgeable and very helpful. I am amazed and grateful. Thank you Ship Smart!!
